description: This file defines a React page component for displaying restaurant details, including fetching restaurant data by ID, rendering hero images, categorizing menu items, and managing a shopping cart for food delivery. It includes UI components for menu item cards, cart summary, and category navigation.

classes.name: RestaurantWithMenu
classes.description: Type combining Restaurant with optional menu items.

classes.name: MenuItemCard
classes.description: Component that renders a menu item with an add-to-cart button.

classes.name: AddToCartBar
classes.description: Sticky footer component showing cart summary and checkout button.

classes.name: RestaurantDetailPage
classes.description: Main React component for displaying restaurant details, menu, and cart interaction.

methods.name: groupMenuByCategory
methods.description: Groups menu items into categories based on heuristics for display purposes.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Handles adding a menu item to the cart, ensuring items are from a single restaurant.

methods.name: handleClearCartForRestaurantChange
methods.description: Clears current cart when switching to a different restaurant before adding new items.
